visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data with series names 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series. Additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data with the series name 'Temperature', and a custom color '#FF6347' is applied to the series. Additional configurations include chart margins, background color, and legend settings to enhance the visual appeal and readability of the chart. Annotations are added to mark the maximum and minimum temperature points on the chart.
